items.title: Evertis selects Honeywell Aclar Technology for pharmaceutical packaging
items.description: By integrating Aclar films into its PET packaging, Evertis aims to optimise manufacturing processes.

items.title: HONEYWELL COMPLETES ACQUISITION OF SUNDYNE TO EXPAND PROCESS INDUSTRY CAPABILITIES
items.description: Honeywell (NASDAQ: HON) today announced the completion of its acquisition of Sundyne from private equity firm Warburg Pincus for $2.16 billion in an all-cash transaction. The acquisition of Sundyne—a leader in the design, manufacturing, and aftermarket support of highly-engineered pumps and gas compressors for process industries—is expected to be immediately accretive to Honeywell's sales growth and segment margins as well as to adjusted EPS in the first full year of ownership.

items.title: Honeywell International Inc. completed the acquisition of Sundyne LLC from Warburg Pincus LLC.
items.description: Honeywell International Inc. agreed to acquire Sundyne LLC from Warburg Pincus LLC for $2.2 billion on March 4, 2025. A cash consideration of $2.16 billion will be paid by Honeywell International...

items.title: Evertis Selects Honeywell Aclar Technology to Enhance Pharmaceutical Packaging
